attributes.action: urge the EU to consider the carbon consequences of moving the European Parliament between Brussels and Strasbourg every month and move to a single location
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Every month, the European Parliament moves out of Brussels and travels across to Strasbourg for a few days.  Then it travels back again.  The EU needs to demonstrate its commitment to carbon reduction by determing a single location for the Parliament.
